content: Yes, that's correct. While it is a challenge to completely eliminate cheating in sports, continued efforts to improve testing methods, develop new technologies, and impose harsher penalties can make it harder for athletes to get away with cheating. Additionally, education and awareness programs for athletes and coaches can help to promote ethical behavior and a commitment to fair play. Ultimately, a strong and consistent stance against cheating can help to create a culture of integrity and sportsmanship in the world of sports.
